description:
JOIN MORE THAN 700 STUDENTS AND FIND OUT HOW LIVE EVENTS CAN BENEFIT YOU!

As an entrepreneur you're always looking for new and exciting ways to move forward. It can sometimes be difficult to come up with new initiatives, even though you know that you have to, in order to stay ahead of your competition. It is likely that you have never considered using a powerful, live event to supercharge your business, but you certainly should. This course is specifically designed to provide you with an insight into how you can become your own event presenter, to significantly benefit your business aspirations.

Why should you consider this course?

Entrepreneurs who have learned to successfully present live events reported that:

  • They have seen a considerable improvement in their status as an expert in their niche
  • They rapidly grew to become a trusted authority in their field
  • They cemented an even closer relationship with their clients, especially if their main mode of operation was mostly online
  • They developed very valuable income streams.

    • My name is Nigel Evans and I am the founder of the EventSchools. I am also the president of the Event Designs Company and I've been involved in organising events for almost 30 years. It's fair to say that my business is one of the most respected in its field and we regularly conduct business across three different continents, for some of the world's most respected corporations. Furthermore, I am also an established entrepreneur and have studied many systems and methodologies in order to learn how to grow successfully.

    I know what it takes to be an entrepreneur and I know all about how challenging it can sometimes be to grow your business in such a competitive environment. As an expert event planner I feel that I am ideally placed to provide you with an educational course like this in order for you to grow your own business, increase your reputation and add income revenue streams.

    In this course, you will learn:

  • How your expertise and experience is valuable
  • Why personal branding is very important to you
  • Why others are thirsty for the information that you have
  • How to grow your own information based product and service line
  • Why live events are so important
  • How you can set yourself apart by using live events
  • How to gather ideas for live events
  • The different types of live event
  • What to consider when choosing venues
  • The details you need to consider when it comes to your decor, audiovisual, set-up, timetable, calendar scheduling, etc
  • What you need to know about marketing
  • How to get the most from your presentations

    • â€¦ and so much more.

    This course should take you a couple of hours to complete and it will be regularly updated with new, downloadable resources and with new lectures.

    Also, don't worry if you find that it is not for you once you start working through it, as there is an unconditional, no-questions-asked and no-hard-feelings 30 day guarantee provided!

    You know, you're obviously really serious about entrepreneurship and learning about live events and I just want to take some time to acknowledge you for that. Most people never take the time to educate themselves the way you have. You're online, you're reading this and you have a commitment and determination to do this now. That's why you're perfect for this course. It's specifically for people like you, who want to learn about using live events in their entrepreneurial business, because they want to give back to others, enhance their reputation in their field and earn additional revenue streams.

    Go ahead and register right now and I will be delighted to see you on the other side!
title: How to Use Live Events to Market Your Business and Grow!
